item.runology.blink_boots.tooltip_2: Holding %1$s will show where the target position will be
book.runology.guidebook.name: Runic Codex
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.discover: I feel a strange and mysterious force... For whatever reason, I feel as if I should imbue a book with this power.
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.basics.gu: After imbuing that strange power into a book, I have obtained powerful knowledge. This path may lead me to power! However... I can't help but wonder... What is that voice in my head telling me all of this?
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.basics.sh: These holes in space appear to lead to somewhere else. While I may not be able to cross them, I may be able to extract energy from them. I will call this energy "Shattered Flow". If I attempt to drain too much Shattered Flow from one, it may become unstable... When unfocused, I can only infuse 20 Shattered Flow into an item, it may be useful to find a better method...
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.basics.ba: There are 4 runes I can utilize to manipulate the world: [#](ff5d00)Heat[#](), [#](00d1ff)Frost[#](), [#](00ff00)Shape[#](), and [#](ffd100)Motion[#](). Utilizing these 4 is powerful but there has to be more...
The [#](ff5d00)Heat Rune[#]() is the simplest to use and manipulates warmth. It may be useful to test the limits of what I can do with this in the future.
The [#](00d1ff)Frost Rune[#]() manipulates coldness, The opposite of the [#](ff5d00)Heat Rune[#](), This rune is simple to use however that doesn't mean it isn't useful.

The [#](00ff00)Shape Rune[#]() manipulates the structure of objects, This rune has great power however is the most difficult to use. It may theoretically be possible to manipulate the structure of molecules however messing with objects on that small of a scale may be difficult.

The [#](ffd100)Motion Rune[#]() manipulates movement of all forms, This rune is a bit complex but not too difficult to use. It may theoretically be possible to manipulate the movement of time however if it is even possible, it certainly will not be easy.
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.basics.sh: This stone... I have never seen it before! But now that I've discovered a shatter, I see that it's everywhere in the caves... is there more to this world than what I can see?
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.basics.ru: While I know about runes, I do not have a method to create them. A gold chisel imbued with Shattered Flow will work.
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.shards.sh: That energy I felt nearby a Shatter... It was powerful, yet dangerous and otherworldly. This energy... I will call it "Shattered Flow". I will need a method to move it around - Shattered Focuses and Relays will work!

Now that I am able to move around Shattered Flow, it may be useful to imbue items without having to walk all the way to a Shatter. The Shattered Infuser will allow me to do just this! It can infuse up to 150 Shattered Flow.
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.basics.sh: With how Shatters output a limited quantity of Shattered Flow and have stability to them, it may be useful to create a tool to let me measure this. With this Reader, I can see a Shatter's Stability, Power, and Output.
Using the Runic Chisel, I can carve runes into Shatterstone, allowing me to channel Shattered Flow properly.
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.basics.re: While Shatters are useful, sometimes they may be created at an inconvenient location. This Reality Reshaper structure will allow me to remove a Shatter and I might even gain something incredibly useful... although... I feel as if it won't go peacefully...
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.shards.sh: Shattered Shards... a physical manifestation of shattered flow. Utilizing this may be the key to more advanced magic.
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.shards.bl: I can make boots capable of letting me "blink" forwards, by pairing a pair of gold boots with Shattered Shards.
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.shards.sh: Utilizing most of what I have learned so far about Shattered Flow, I have made a device capable of zapping every living thing that comes near it except for those like me. It will cost 10 Shattered Flow to run.
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.shards.he: By mixing the magical properties of blaze powder with a shattered shard along with gold to channel it, I can create a beam of fire capable of smelting batches of anything I throw into it. It will cost 50 Shattered Flow to run.
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.shards.sh: Gold, while it is a good material, it is not quite as good as it can be. I can make gold channel Shattered Flow better by imbuing it into the gold.
advancements.runology.runology.title: Runology
advancements.runology.shatter.title: What Is This and How Do I Get Rid of It?
advancements.runology.shatter.descriptio: Discover a shatter in the world
advancements.runology.shatterstone.title: Shatterstone
misc.runology.power_activate: I feel power flowing through my body, building up at my fists. Whatever this is... it may be what is needed.
